title: Vacation
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Riko-chan, are you enjoying summer break so far?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yeah, the summer festival we all went to the other day was a lot of fun, and Aqours went swimming in the ocean last week.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>That sounds fun, I kind of want to swim too. It’s vacation-.... No, summer break, after all. We have to enjoy the most out of it, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Right, you also have a vacation period in Switzerland, huh. What do you usually do over there?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Hmm, a lot of people go on a trip or just relax in nature. I think we would also go swimming at the beach or hiking in the mountains.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Waah, that sounds great. I kind of want to go on a vacation trip too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, but isn’t every day like a trip for you, Riko-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>What do you mean?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>You have a beautiful sea right next to you, and a mountain too, right? I went to the top shrine the other day, and the view from up there was really gorgeous. Also, the fish, the mikan, and the food are delicious! I would love to spend my vacation in Numazu.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, I guess you’re right. Then, why don’t you come over and stay at my house next time? You’re always welcome for a trip to Numazu♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
